body_html:
@georgedahl
def embedding_lookup_sparse(params, sp_ids, sp_weights,
name=None,
combiner="mean"):
Args:
params: A single tensor representing the complete embedding tensor,

I suppose params to be single tensor, then for my problem input X must be a tensor which is dense,
but X actually should be sparse, converting to dense is not good..

                            name=None,

  Args:
